Source.Name: sigrok-cli
Source.Summary: A command-line tool that interfaces with various signal analyzers
Source.Description: sigrok-cli is a command-line tool written in C, which uses both libsigrok and libsigrokdecode to provide the basic sigrok functionality from the command-line. Among other things, it's useful for scripting purposes.

Package.Name: sigrok-cli
Package.Summary: A command-line tool that interfaces with various signal analyzers
Package.Description: sigrok-cli is a command-line tool written in C, which uses both libsigrok and libsigrokdecode to provide the basic sigrok functionality from the command-line. Among other things, it's useful for scripting purposes.
